plot: A documentary for Discovery Channel Asia, Europe and South America. Kristina Foster dives with sharks and interviews, Glen Bohan, one of the world's few survivors of a Great White Shark attack.
title: Swimming with Sharks
plot_es: A documentary for Discovery Channel Asia, Europe and South America. Kristina Foster dives with sharks and interviews, Glen Bohan, one of the world's few survivors of a Great White Shark attack.
plot_en: A documentary for Discovery Channel Asia, Europe and South America. Kristina Foster dives with sharks and interviews, Glen Bohan, one of the world's few survivors of a Great White Shark attack.
